label: Fail to extract the right entities
rationale: The model anchored its cutoff on 2010-dated content (e.g., Jackass 3D) and/or earlier samples, while the gold row includes a 2017-dated entity ("Ballon'dor Winners" year 2017). The model failed to identify/extract that later 2017 entity as the latest time anchor, causing an underestimation of the knowledge cutoff.

label: Fail to extract the right entities
rationale: The model inferred a year from cited experiments (e.g., Li et al. 2010, Huang 2011) and its internal knowledge instead of extracting the literature review's metadata. It failed to identify the review/article publication year (2018) from the provided gold row.
